name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to Bloomberg, the EU plans to

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of September 28, in Suzhou, Jiangsu Province, a woman got into an argument with a local vendor while driving near Shihu Jingyuan Community. During the argument, the woman said to the vendor, "Outsiders, get out of Suzhou," which aroused public anger. Citizens surrounded the woman and her car, and shouted in unison, "Apologize! Apologize!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 28 (Released) Tsinghua University purchased promotion services on Twitter to promote the school's international students. Because the photos used in the advertisement were of Russians, many foreign netizens who saw the push advertisement left "good wishes"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After Israel killed the leader of Hezbollah, Chinese experts' previous comments on the situation between Iran and Israel were dug up one after another, sparking ridicule from netizens. Netizens responded, "Experts have never made correct predictions."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, the official Kuaishou account of Hong Kong Satellite TV has also been banned by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 28 (Release) Xianyang, Shaanxi. A man said that he just went out for a while, and when he came back, he found that his house was demolished by the Changwu County Government, and there was no compensation. The man said: Is this what the Communist Party under Xi Jinping's leadership does? Please, President Xi Jinping, look at what you have done and compensate my family.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 27, Hangzhou, Zhejiang. Internet celebrity "Meng Qingduo" posted a video saying that he was robbed by someone with a knife and explosives when he drove a Rolls-Royce into a hotel's underground garage on the 24th. After a fight, the gangster was subdued, and the explosives exploded, causing damage to the vehicle. The police reported: The gangster was detained.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 26, CCTV Military reposted a statement from the Ministry of National Defense: Communication between the Chinese and US militaries helps control risks. Eleven minutes later, it reposted another statement saying that the US is an undoubted provocateur, troublemaker, and destroyer.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 29, a blogger posted a video of various places hanging national flags to welcome the National Day, which was questioned by many netizens as a waste. Netizens responded, "Why not subsidize the grassroots people? This is the blood of the people. This is a century-long project, and someone has become rich overnight."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 28 (Released) Zhangjiakou, Hebei. A village cadre of Hujiatun Village worked as an agent at a local CCB branch. He took advantage of his position to absorb villagers' deposits, and the actual deposits were all transferred to his personal account. The amount involved was as high as tens of millions. The hard-earned money saved by many elderly people throughout their lives turned into bubbles. Some elderly people had to rely on neighbors for help for food because they were cheated of all their pension money.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 29 (Release) A blogger posted a video saying that a truck driver was pulling a truckload of oranges from Yunnan. When passing through the Lihe Toll Station in Foshan, he was told that his vehicle was overweight and was charged 1,080 yuan. To prove his innocence, the truck driver went to other toll stations nearby, and all of them showed that the truck was not overweight. The blogger said: The last straw that broke the camel's back for us truck drivers was not the low freight rates, but you, the termites that suck our blood.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Iran's Supreme Leader Khamenei's post on X was annotated by the community:
Khamenei posted: Hezbollah is the winner.
Community note: The entire Hezbollah leadership, including Nasrallah, was eliminated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 29, Xi Jinping said at the national medals and honorary titles award ceremony: We must encourage the whole society to respect heroes, learn from heroes, and strive to become heroes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 27, Xiao Yu, a doctoral student in history at Peking University, released a video explaining who is a spy and who is more likely to become a spy. He said that among the powers that have harmed China in modern history, Russia is the first, but many people always gnash their teeth at other countries, but selectively forget about Russia. If there are no spies involved, it would be a miracle. Real spies like to praise and glorify China no matter what, so that they can easily get promoted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 28 (Released) Dalian. A notice from the Huize Community of Hongqi Street circulated online stated that any couple with household registration in the area, both unemployed and with an only child under the age of 18, can receive a 5 yuan reward for the only child of unemployed couples every month after providing the following materials.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: During his visit to London, UK, Hong Kong Financial Secretary Paul Chan expressed confidence that the national security law can ensure a stable and predictable environment for Hong Kong's economic development, and stressed that Hong Kong will never be another mainland city.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 26, the central government first proposed to "promote the real estate market to stabilize", and there were constant calls for price maintenance and price increases in the market. On September 28, a real estate company in Henan announced a 2% price increase. Before that, many real estate companies in Sichuan also announced price increases, and the central enterprise Poly launched a "price maintenance plan"
